com.sneakyrocket.pocketrocket.v1.core.response

Class ResponseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sneakyrocket.pocketrocket.v1.core.response.ResponseHandler

  • public class ResponseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads the connection to determine the appropriate response, then creates the response after parsing its arguments.
    Author:
    Jordan Crawford

      • getInstance

        public static ResponseHandler getInstance()
        If an instance does not exist, creates one. Returns the response handler.

      • getResponse

        public Response getResponse(Connection connection)
        Reads the connection. Determines the code of the response and the arguments section (anything after ":"). Creates the relevant response handler.
        Parameters:
        connection -
        Returns:
